channel.title: +1 Forward - Tendencies: Spirits & Glamour
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/tendencies-spirits-and-glamour
Rach and Rich bring on Dusty De Leon of HellaBigWorks games to talk about their RPG about Small Town Heroics and Big Time Adventures.
**Timecodes**: 0:02:23 - Read a Sitch about Love Letters and Set Pieces 0:06:26 - Open Your Brain to Tendencies: Spirits and Glamour 0:15:16 - Act Under Fire with Plussy and Lamar
You can find more of Dusty's stuff on their itch page: https://hellabigworks.itch.io/ Find *Tendencies* on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/TendenciesG
